mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (name, email, password, role, height, weight, health_condition, goal) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{role, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{healthCondition}, #{goal})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY mno
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name = #{name}, password = #{password}, role = #{role}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, health_condition = #{healthCondition}, goal = #{goal} WHERE mno = #{mno}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
